item.title: Kinkasan Travel Guide (Miyagi/Tohoku/Japan/East Asia/Asia)
item.description: Plan your trip to Kinkasan with this comprehensive travel guide, covering all the essential aspects of sightseeing, food, accommodation, culture, safety, and transportation. Discover the best places to visit, things to do, when to go, and more.
